document_data.name: Torgan Minerson
document_data.mainbody: '''Torgan Minerson''' was a [[human]] male, and the proprietor of [[The Roots of the Earth]] tavern in [[Eshpurta]], [[Amn]], in early [[1370 DR|1370 DR, the Year of the Tankard]]. Torgan was once trapped in a mine cave-in and claimed he saw visions during the traumatic experience. He subsequently retired from mining and opened his tavern, which also housed a shrine to [[Grumbar]],{{Cite web enhancement/Deities|6}} Torgan retold the story of his entrapment and revelations to any who would listen.
